title: Come & Take It Productions scraper output
description: All artists (headliners and supporting acts) scraped from Come And Take It Productions event pages.

results.title: Results
results.description: One item per artist per event, including event and role metadata.

eventUrl.description: URL of the event detail page.

eventTitle.description: Title of the event as shown on the page.

eventDateText.description: Raw event date text, e.g. 'Tuesday, December 02'.

showTime.description: Show time parsed from the page, if available.

doorsTime.description: Doors time parsed from the page, if available.

priceText.description: Ticket price text as displayed (may include ranges / day-of).

venueName.description: Venue name as parsed from the event page.

artistName.description: Name of the artist (headliner or support).

role.description: Role of the artist on the bill, e.g. 'headliner' or 'support'.
